name: BluetoothDevice.gatt
description: The BluetoothDevice.gatt read-only property returns a reference to the device's BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The BluetoothDevice.gattread-only property returns areference to the device's BluetoothRemoteGATTServer.
